Name: Nevins Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Whiskey and apricot combine beautifully with a light burst of citrus in this easy sipper.
Nutrition: One serving of Nevins Cocktail contains 151 calories
